page.title: 05St.Peter's C.E.Primary Sch.
page.content: {School grounds:}one playing field, tarmacced play-ground areas all around school building(approx. 0.5 hectares). {School building:}Three classrooms with cloakrooms,storeroom,hall(used for dining,TV,music,PE,concerts & meetings),kitchen,staffroom,toilets, caretaker's room,entrance hall.Heating :solid fuel boiler and radiators. {Pupils:}aged 5-11 yrs (then they transfer to Ordsall Hall Comprehensive School,Retford).N.O.R. 50 pupils:31 boys & 19 girls;all except 2 pupils live within the village. {Staffing:}Headteacher:Mrs P.E.Whitmore appointed Sept.1982;Dep.Headteacher: Mrs L.M.Vlacho appointed Sept.1972. Part-time teacher(15Hrs):Mrs C.Smith (Jan 1984);Secretary(8Hrs):Mrs P. Merrills (May 1983);Caretaker:Mrs D. Weightman(Aug.1980).Cook:Mrs G.Slater (May 1973) + Miss K.Dudding (Jan 1961)
